description:
An open-source ebook reader designed for immersive and deep reading experiences.

Readest is a modern, feature-rich ebook reader designed for avid readers offering seamless cross-platform access, powerful tools, and an intuitive interface to elevate your reading experience.
Release Highlight
- Text-to-Speech: Automatically moves to the next chapter when the current chapter finishes
- Reading: Fixed the reading ruler on Android
- Reading: Improved RSVP layout and stability
- Reading: Fixed an issue where some EPUB books could not adjust font size
- Annotations: Added a magnifier (loupe) when adjusting text selection
- Annotations: Text selection now snaps to word boundaries for better accuracy
- Annotations: Custom highlight colors now apply correctly in the sidebar
- Dictionary: Added a back button for easier navigation
- Dictionary: Fixed an issue where Dictionary and Wikipedia could not open on Android
- Metadata: Added collapsible sections in Book Details
- Metadata: Added support for parsing series information from Calibre-exported EPUB files
- Eink: Improved component layout and colors in E-ink mode
- Layout: Sidebar toggle button position is now persistent
What's Changed
- fix(layout): show navigation buttons with higher z-index, closes #3201 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3204
- fix: reader ruler unresponsive in android by @WhiteHades in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3210
- fix: para mode nav buttons issue in eink by @WhiteHades in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3212
- i18n: add support for Hebrew, closes #3216 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3218
- feat: back button dictionary by @WhiteHades in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3220
- fix: status button eink compatible by @WhiteHades in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3223
- fix(android): fixed some annotation tools not responsive to tap on Android, closes #3225 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3229
- feat(l10n): format sync date time with current locale, closes #3219 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3230
- fix(progress): show physical left pages instead of estimated ones, closes #3213 and closes #3200 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3231
- doc: update toubleshooting and features list, closes #3224 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3232
- fix: fixed docker build by including some dist files in docker image, closes #3233 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3241
- feat(metadata): collapsible sections in book details, closes #3217 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3243
- compat: compatibility with older webview on Android, closes #3245 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3249
- fix: don't cache section content when updating subitems, closes #3242 and closes #3206 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3250
- fix(layout): workaround for hardcoded table layout, closes #3205 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3251
- feat(annotator): rounded highlight style for horizontal and vertical layout, closes #3208 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3252
- fix(layout): fixed some layout issues for RSVP, closes #3199 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3254
- fix(tts): fix paused tts will still read to the end of the current paragraph, closes #3244 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3256
- feat(annotator): add a loupe when adjusting text selection range, closes #3001 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3261
- fix(eink): more legibility for the dictionary and wikipedia popups on Eink devices, closes #3258 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3262
- feat(annotator): snap text selection to word boundary, closes #3234 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3265
- fix: expose srcdoc also for html sections, closes #3264 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3266
- feat(metadata): support parsing series info from calibre exported EPUBs, closes #3259 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3267
- fix(layout): persistent location for the sidebar toggle, closes #3193 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3269
- doc: update sponsor link in README by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3275
- fix(tts): navigate to follow the current TTS location for the next section, closes #3198 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3276
- fix(layout): respect image dimension attribute, closes #3274 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3277
- fix(annotator): apply custom highlight colors in sidebar, closes #3273 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3278
- release: version 0.9.100 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/3279
